skills.name: ANGRY SMASH
desc: • Deal 3 hits of true damage to a single target that increases based on your MAX HP.
• Deal an additional hit of true damage if you have Ascension.
• Deal an additional hit of true damage if the enemy has any Golden effects.
• Inflict Cleave on all enemies for 3 turns.

skills.name: SEETHING BIDE
desc: • Remove all Negative Effects including Silver and Innate effects on self.
• Gain Heal Shield and Regen HP for 3 turns on self.

skills.name: INDOMITABLE SNOWMAN
desc: • At the start of battle and at the start of your turn, inflict Taunt and Permanently lower Defense by -15% a random enemy for 1 turn.
• Whenever you take damage, gain Golden Hit, Critical Strike and Ascension for 2 turns.
• The first time you reach 1 HP, Gain Max HP UP until you die and heal 50% of Max HP..
